alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 9:10PM CDT until July 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 910 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fordland to near Diggins to 9 miles southeast of Sparta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ava, Seymour, Mansfield, Fordland, Diggins, Elkhead, Bruner, Keltner and Dogwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
